pages.title: Pincule
pages.text: A prickly purple pint-sized peculiar cactus. Found in the Abnormal Desert biome.
... and of course, their alternative funky fabulous flamboyant ferocious cousins can also be found in the Abnormal Desert.

pages.title: Pincule Fruit
pages.text: Did you know you can harvest a pincule's fruit with a pair of shears? Watch your fingers!
